text: Trick or Treat is a 1952 animated short movie. It was produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Voice cast== *Clarence Nash as Donald Duck, Huey, Dewey, and Louie *June Foray as Hazel the Witch ==References== Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck Category:Halloween movies Category:Short movies Category:Movies about witchcraft
title: Trick or Treat (1952 movie)
